# Load Libraries
```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(glue)=
```

# Setup
```{r}
data_name <- config::get("raw_data_name")
```

# Read Data
```{r}
raw_data <- read_csv(here("data", "raw", glue("{data_name}-data.csv")))
```

# Clean Data
```{r}
clean_data <- raw_data |>
    clean_names()
```

# Write data
```{r}
write_rds(clean_data, here("data", "clean", glue("cleaned-{data_name}-data.rds")))
```
